events.name: Grails48 - Rio de Janeiro
events.about: Grails48 is a global community hackathon series and startup mentorship program. Our first event newbie is taking place Nov 9-11th, 2012 online and in various locations. The purpose of Grails48 is to bring the Grails world together igniting innovation with our favorite JVM based tools and platforms.

events.name: BlackBerry Jam Sessions #5 - Rio de Janeiro, BR
events.about: Ouvimos o que developers pediram e melhoramos ponto a ponto todos os itens, tudo para criar a melhor experiência de hackathon já realizada. Mais informações http://www.blackberryjamsessions.com
